hooks.command: bash -c 'if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(env|credentials|api_keys|secrets|config\.json)$ ]]; then echo "⚠️ 敏感文件保護:阻止修改機密文件" && exit 1; fi'

bash -c 'case "$file_path" in *.py) black "$file_path" 2>/dev/null && echo "✓ Formatted $file_path" || echo "⚠️ Black formatting failed for $file_path" ;; *.js|*.ts|*.jsx|*.tsx) prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null && echo "✓ Formatted $file_path" || echo "⚠️ Prettier formatting failed for $file_path" ;; *.go) gofmt -w "$file_path" 2>/dev/null && echo "✓ Formatted $file_path" || echo "⚠️ gofmt formatting failed for $file_path" ;; esac'
python3 .claude/scheduler/quality_check.py 2>/dev/null || echo "⚠️ Quality check script not found or failed"
